name: Star Wars Universe
description: In a galaxy far far away... Let's have a deep dive into the universe of the famous fantascientific saga, from the challenges of the first movie to the merchandising, every fact that a Star Wars fan needs to know.

name: The World of Harry Potter
description: Facts and curiosity of the magical world created by JK Rowling

name: Sand and Worms
description: Have a look into the universe of Dune, the fantascientific saga written by Frank Herbert that will soon return on the big screen

name: Christopher Nolan
description: A deep dive into the filmography of the British-American filmmaker
